title: City Ambulance Driver
fullContent: Home› DrivingCity Ambulance DriverBy OnlineGames.ioTest your precision and reflexes in City Ambulance Driver as you take the role of the savior of the people in need. Whether is an accident or another unexpected situations, people need help to be rescued.You rush with the ambulence or helicopter to the red pin placed on the map. Transport the patients to the hospital carefully and faster. Be a hero and save as many lives as you can.Select the level• There are 10 levels ready to completed. Follow the instructions and follow the red pin on the map.City Ambulance Driver Controls:• Use WASD to control ambulanceThis article was updated on February 20, 20241 Player3DDrivingFlyingFreeHelicopterHospitalSimulatorSpeedTraffic
